mapper.select: select seq, mem_id, mem_name, board_subject, board_content, reg_date, upt_date, view_cnt from board_study where seq > 0 order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into board_study (seq,mem_id,mem_name,board_subject,board_content,reg_date) values((select nvl(MAX(seq)+1,0) from board_study), #{mem_id}, #{mem_name}, #{board_subject}, #{board_content}, (select SYSDATE from SYS.DUAL) )
